item.title: Sentiment Analysis for Monetary Policy Predictions
item.description: This project highlights the scope for using text data from central bank statements to improve predictions about policy rates. The problem is constructed as a classification into three potential outcomes: the rate in the next period goes up, goes down, or stays the same.
